name: NIKITA by Virtuals
description: Nikita is a Virtuals-based AI agent designed to empower individuals with AI-driven alpha, project evaluations, ecosystem sentiment, and Crypto Twitter analysis. It offers market sentiment insights, advanced project discovery and analysis tools, an AI market-intelligence terminal, and inter-agent interactions. With a focus on delivering actionable insights, Nikita supports informed decision-making and adapts to the evolving needs of the ecosystem.
